column4: i installed lightdm window management but i got kde on ubuntu. can anyone tell me that both are same or different
hello can anyone help me
ask and see
i installed lightdm window management but i got kde on my ubuntu. both are same or different
you can use whichever DM you desire. There is just one which is used
my question is lightdm and kde.. is there any difference between them
i installed lightdm but i got kdm desktop management
thats fine, you can do that
can you tell me plz
If you want to use lightdm, just install it
its telling that "already installed new version"
did you run the command in blue prefixed with sudo?
its telling command not found
so you ran:  sudo /etc/iit.d/vboxdrv setup
so you ran:  sudo /etc/init.d/vboxdrv setup
command not found still?
yes
its coming like this
did you run:  sudo usermod -a -G vboxusers sasuke     then log off and on?
you may need to run:  sudo groupadd vboxusers    first
I also recommend you ask in #vbox
